snippet: With controversy building over its role in a Mexican bribery scandal, Wal-Mart’s desire to stay out of the limelight grows.
abstract: Controversy is building over Wal-Mart's role in a Mexican bribery scandal, and the company's desire to stay out of the limelight will now be put to a test; to help weather the fallout, company will rely on the relationships it has worked assiduously to develop in Washington during the last decade--relationships that its critics say have insulated it from political threats.
lead_paragraph: With controversy building over its role in a Mexican bribery scandal, Wal-Mart’s desire to stay out of the limelight grows.

headline.seo: Wal-Mart’s Good Citizen Efforts Face a Test
headline.main: Wal-Mart’s Good-Citizen Efforts Face a Test
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart’s Good-Citizen Efforts Face a Test
